name: Vasa Museum
description: Home to the well-preserved 17th-century warship Vasa, showcasing the ship's history and the era it represents.

name: Skansen
description: The world’s first open-air museum featuring historic buildings, traditional crafts, and Nordic wildlife.

name: Moderna Museet
description: A modern art museum with an impressive collection of 20th-century art, including works by Picasso and Dalí.

name: Nationalmuseum
description: Sweden's premier museum of art and design, showcasing a rich collection of paintings, sculptures, and decorative arts.

name: Fotografiska
description: A contemporary photography museum with rotating exhibitions featuring both established and emerging photographers.

name: ABBA The Museum
description: An interactive experience dedicated to the iconic Swedish pop group, featuring memorabilia and music experiences.

name: Nobel Prize Museum
description: Celebrates the Nobel Prize and its laureates with exhibits on their achievements, located in the Old Town.

name: Swedish History Museum
description: Covers Sweden’s history from the Stone Age to the present, featuring artifacts, Viking treasures, and more.

name: Royal Palace (Kungliga Slottet)
description: Houses several museums, including the Royal Armory, in addition to being the official residence of the Swedish monarchy.

name: The Museum of Medieval Stockholm
description: An immersive journey through Stockholm's medieval past, showcasing artifacts, models, and interactive displays.
